1: O Lord, my heart is not proud, nor do I have a haughty look.[c] I do not have great aspirations, or concern myself with things that are beyond me.[d]
2: Indeed,[e] I have calmed and quieted myself[f] like a weaned child with its mother;[g] I am content like a young child.[h]
3: O Israel, hope in the Lord now and forevermore!
